name: Saturday Night Rituals
description:
This game was made using  bitsy v5.1

This is my first bitsy game, inspired by the small, everyday rituals I sometimes do before a social situation I'm anxious about attending.  I hope you enjoy it! 

p.s I don't have a giant pentagram on my bedroom floor, I just thought it might be a fun way to fill the space. 

Also,  the tarot words are from Golden Thread Tarot
